signin.title: Sign in
signin.subtitle: Enter your credentials to sign in to your account

reports.footer: zero harm - no loss of life
reports.nmha: Tick NMHA if a card is also completed. Send a copy of the report to the Admin Secretary, who will place a copy in the VFL folder on the server and update the VFL tracker spread sheet. A copy this report should be posted in the area assessed. Inform all persons who have follow up actions to complete.
reports.hsm: Refer to the User Guide HSM 0041.1 for assistance in undertaking ‘Incident Prevention Talks’. Consider the ‘at risk categories’ when observing the person or task and record below: If more than one person is seen performing the unsafe act, i.e., two people not wearing hearing protection, then records as 2 unsafe acts.
